problem: Trace.c

n = int(input())
l, r = 0, 10**18
b = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = [0 for i in range(n)]
for i in range(n // 2):
	a[i] = max(l, b[i] - r)
	a[-i - 1] = b[i] - a[i]
	l, r = a[i], a[-i - 1]
print(*a)
long long A,_[(int)2e6],*C;main(n,i,x){C=_+1e6;for(scanf("%d",&n);i++<n;A=(C[x-i]+=x)>A?C[x-i]:A)scanf("%d",&x);printf("%lld",A);}
fixed: long long n,i,x,A,_[(int)2e6],*C;main(){C=_+(int)1e6;for(scanf("%d",&n);i++<n;A=((C[x-i]+=x)>A?C[x-i]:A))scanf("%d",&x);printf("%lld",A);}
